download_full.label: Download biggest size
download_full.info: Download current size or biggest size

using_pjax_without_pillar.label: Using pjax without pillar
using_pjax_without_pillar.info: Using pjax without pillar needs to disable the automatic pillar hacks (for example, list layout on Madison2 requires this flag enabled)

trigger_el.label: Trigger Element
trigger_el.info: jQuery Element that triggers Photoswipe. Needs to be the parent of the img tag. Leave empty to use the default based on current theme. Example for Axis: a.k-link-lightbox

scroll_el.label: Scroll Trigger Element
scroll_el.info: jQuery Element that triggers Koken's keyboard scroll. Leave empty to use the default based on current theme.
